segments.text: Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you should tell me you were in love with her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am telling you now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you might have told me before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't think you would be interested .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't be serious . How dare you not tell me you are going to marry her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I didn't think it mattered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you men ! You are all the same .
segments.speaker: S1
